frontmatter.title: A System for Automatic Calculation of the Eye-Voice Span

node.html: A system to predict the level of english of a reader by analysing the movement of eye gaze and the phonetics (voice). Introduced a new approach to compute the eye voice span.

frontmatter.title: Text classification of BBC news dataset

node.html: This project is about text classification ie: given a text, we would want to predict its class (tech, business, sport, entertainment or politics), We compered perfomence of different models and visualize word embedding in 2D and 3D.
Detection of questions on Quora, and classification of insincere questions user tensorflow hub.
In this project, we built a Face Mask Detector using Keras, Tensorflow, MobileNet and OpenCV.
A simple Google Keep clone built with Vue and Firebase.
